description:
Description

Educational comedy and creativity are combined in this amazing showcase of acting, instructing, and vocal talent; guaranteed to inspire, educate, and entertain! This program is a unique approach to looking at success & happiness as expressed through dramatized personal stories inspired by our most beloved celebrities, historical figures, and fictional characters.

An exciting 10-module video learning experience with 4 lesson units, 6 core concept reviews, and 2 major course summaries. Featuring 4 unique and entertaining “special interviews” plus more added surprises along the way!

Scenario

Four guests are invited on a special talk show to speak about their life and how it relates to a keyword, which links to their personal story. One special celebrity guest “co-host” is selected and scheduled to appear on The Exceed Machine LIVE!

Your Role to Play

You are a VIP audience member on a talk show! But not just any talk show… You’ve been gifted a VIP ticket (a $497 value) to the top-rated & highest-grossing show of all time… The Exceed Machine LIVE!

This show is enchanted! In this talk show anyone and everyone, real or make-believe, is fair game for an interview or a special appearance. You really never know what you are going to get on The Exceed Machine LIVE!

You are here to witness and learn by listening straight through or taking notes as you go… either way, hold on to your seat… and enjoy the ride!
title: The EXCEED Machine! How to be FUN, SUCCESSFUL, and WEALTHY!
